mapper.update:
update serviceinfo
serviceId = #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pwId = #{pwid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serviceType = #{servicetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aXcId = #{axcid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zXcId = #{zxcid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activeStatus = #{activestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rootSite = #{rootsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchSite = #{branchsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
aAcId = #{aacid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zAcId = #{zacid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
aSiteId = #{asiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zSiteId = #{zsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isSingle = #{issingle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cestype = #{cestype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobstatus = #{jobstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clientId = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchMainSite = #{branchmainsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchProtectSite = #{branchprotectsite,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zmostAcIds = #{zmostacids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amostAcIds = #{amostacids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update serviceinfo set serviceId = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pwId = #{pwId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serviceType = #{serviceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aXcId = #{axcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zXcId = #{zxcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activeStatus = #{activeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aAcId = #{aAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zAcId = #{zAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, aSiteId = #{aSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zSiteId = #{zSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isSingle = #{isSingle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cestype = #{cestype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jobstatus = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientId = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activatingTime = #{activatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo where serviceType=0 and (asiteid=#{0} or zsiteid=#{0})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO serviceinfo ( serviceId, pwId, serviceType, NAME, aXcId, zXcId, activeStatus, rootSite, branchSite, aAcId, zAcId, createUser, createTime, aSiteId, zSiteId, isSingle, cestype, clientId ) SELECT s1.serviceId, s1.pwId, s1.serviceType, concat( #{0} ) NAME, s1.aXcId, s2.zXcId, s1.activeStatus, s1.rootSite, s1.branchSite, s1.aAcId, s2.zAcId, s1.createUser, now() createTime,s1.aSiteId, s2.zSiteId, 0, s1.cestype, 0 FROM serviceinfo s1 ,serviceinfo s2 WHERE s1.id =#{1} and s2.id =#{2}
mapper.delete: delete s from serviceinfo s where isSingle=0 and serviceType=1 and id in #{0}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM serviceinfo WHERE pwId = #{0} and serviceType = 0
select * from serviceinfo where id=#{0} and serviceType=0
mapper.update:
update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{status} where id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo where serviceType=0 and ((asiteid=#{0} and axcid=#{1}) or (zsiteid=#{0} and zxcid=#{1}))
mapper.update: update serviceinfo set activeStatus=#{1} where serviceType=0 and (aSiteId = #{0} or zSiteId = #{0})
mapper.select: select * from serviceinfo where serviceType = 0 and isSingle=#{1} and (aSiteId = #{0} or zSiteId = #{0})

SELECT s.jobstatus,s.cestype,s.issingle , s.id, s.serviceId, s.pwId, s.serviceType, s.name, s.aXcId, s.zXcId, s.aAcId, s.zAcId, s.activeStatus,s.aSiteId,s.zSiteId, s.createTime,s.createUser,s.aSiteId AS showaSiteName,s.zSiteId AS showzSiteName, s.clientId FROM serviceinfo s, pwinfo p WHERE s.pwId = p.pwId and serviceType=0
